title: The Business of Sports: April 14, 2017
itunes:title: The Business of Sports: April 14, 2017
description:
Bloomberg’s Scott Soshnick and Michael Barr cover the week’s top stories in the sports industry and talk about the business of basketball with former National Basketball Commissioner David Stern.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
